name: Snake Dungeon (AtomicAnt, karelessocelot)
description:
You are a very hungry snake! Luckily you guard the treasure that every adventurer wants so there will be plenty to eat!

How to play:

- Use your mouse to go over enemies to eat them and increase your length!

- Dodge projectiles from wizards, avoid getting cut by warriors, and avoid biting yourself!

- Objective: Get the highest length you can!

Credits:

Thank you karelessocelot for all music and sounds in the game!

Also used LootLocker for the leaderboard in the game, thanks as well!
